<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archwizard's Might](/Feats.aspx?ID=662) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 213 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[archwizard's spellcraft](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You have mastered the greatest secrets of arcane magic. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.
name: Archwizard's Might
